message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it for $1,500,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $1,500,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While that initial price reflects the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  I'm confident you won't find this value proposition anywhere else.
I'm still interested in the product, but $1,350,000 is too high. I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for it, which is the maximum I'm willing to go.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,100,000 is unfortunately too low for me to consider. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,225,000. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to pay more than $1,100,000. I'm sticking to my previous offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
